archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1100
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer I want to see my top used data sites and be recommended options with this (e.g 70% of your data was used on social media, netflix etc), so that I can understand how I am using my data

properties.value: NEW: OOTB Comarch delivers classified data via regula data export (kafka). Information if this is netflix or social media must be delivered by the network. is it correc assumtion that Comarch responsibility end on it and top used data report will not be created by Comarch? Second part of the requirment is 4 Recommendation engine. It is Base1?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
